snippet: New books by Zbigniew Brzezinski and Robert Kagan address the subject of America’s decline from opposite sides of the political aisle but find much room for agreement.
abstract: Jonathan Freedland reviews books Strategic Vision: America and the Crisis of Global Power by Zbigniew Brzezinski and The World America Made by Robert Kagan.
lead_paragraph: New books by Zbigniew Brzezinski and Robert Kagan address the subject of America’s decline from opposite sides of the political aisle but find much room for agreement.

headline.seo: Zbigniew Brzezinski and Robert Kagan on the State of America
